name: Polaroid Slider Lite
author: Ernest Marcinko - anago @ codecanyon

sections.description:
Polaroid slider Lite mimics the feeling of the old-style polaroid photographs. Its a powerful javascript-css slider using CSS3 and jQuery.

Features List:

  • Video/Image/HTML slides
  • Fully customisable slide label with HTML content
  • Smooth slide animations with Ken Burns Effect
  • Supports all major browsers (IE7+, FF, Chrome, Safari…) and mobile devices (Windows Phone, Android, IOS)
  • Uses jQuery for maximum compatibility

Homepage: wp-dreams.com

Pro version Demo: Polaroid Slider
Description Page: Polaroid Slider on Codecanyon

Pro version Features:

  • Demo: Polaroid Slider
  • Unlimited sliders and slides
  • 20+ Slider settings, manage animations, effects, colors and size
  • Powerful subslide system with navigation
  • Responsive design
  • Slider widget
  • Content Drag Effect with subslides – [Demo] (http://wp-dreams.com/demo/wp-polaroid-slider/fun-with-subslides/)
  • Slide generator for Flickr.com and 500px.com rss feeds

Plugin website

http://wp-dreams.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload polaroid-slider-lite to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the shortcode from the settings into your template or post-page

short_description: A nice looking polaroid-style image/video slider.
